Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory | [[Battle of Pylos | the battle]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'With Spartan soldiers cornered at Pylos, Brasidas asked Kassandra to join forces with Sparta to help turn the tide of battle. It was also rumored that Alexios|Deimos was fighting for the Athens|Athenians.'

General_Description: '''The Battle of Pylos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was requested to join [[Brasidas]] at the [[Battle of Pylos]].
Section_Dialogue:
===Spartan camp===
Entering the Spartan camp is optional. Kassandra may instead enter the battle directly.

Leaving [[Sparta]], Kassandra travelled to the Spartan camp in [[Pylos]], [[Messenia]]. She spoke to one of the [[Labotas|soldiers]] there.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where's Brasidas?''
*'''Labotas:''' ''What do you want with him?''

<tabber>
|-|None of your business.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't question me—take me to him.''
*'''Labotas:''' ''It concerns Sparta, so it concerns me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you were so "concerned," you'd be with your brothers preparing for battle. Now let's go.''
|-|He's a friend.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We fought together.''
*'''Labotas:''' ''A friend?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Yes... and a friend of Sparta. Now take me to him.''
</tabber>
*'''Labotas:''' ''Stop. I have orders—stand guard and wait for reinforcements. They were due two nights ago.''

<tabber>
|-|I am your reinforcements.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can stop waiting. I've arrived.''
*'''Labotas:''' ''You?! The [[Athens|Athenians]] are dogs at our throats. You won't talk so tough once you see them.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I join you, and all they'll see is the [[Charon|ferryman]].''
*'''Labotas:''' ''Ha! Well met, warrior. You better fight as good as you talk. Come. We go to Brasidas.''
|-|They're not coming.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I didn't see any of your ships when I came in, but I can help.''
*'''Labotas:''' ''They're... sunk? My father was the captain on one of those ships. Come. Pledge your [[Spear of Leonidas|spear]] to Brasidas.''
</tabber>
Kassandra, Labotas and the rest of the Spartans entered the fray.

===Battle===
[[File:ACOD The Battle of Pylos 3.png|thumb|250px|Deimos entering the battlefield]]
After Kassandra eliminated several Athenian soldiers, she and the other Spartans witnessed [[Alexios|Deimos]] marching onto the battlefield wielding the [[Sword of Damokles]], fighting for Athens. Brasidas charged at him. Kassandra yelled out.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Brasidas!''
*'''Brasidas:''' ''Yaaaarh!''
Deimos deflected Brasidas' attack and felled him with apparent ease.
[[File:ACOD The Battle of Pylos 5.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra confronting Deimos]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Deimos! ...This fight is between you and me.''
*'''Deimos:''' ''And it is one you can not win.''
Kassandra and Deimos engaged with each other.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If Brasidas dies, his blood is on your hands.''
*'''Deimos:''' ''His, yours, and every one of your friends'.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Are you mad?! We can still stop—''
*'''Deimos:''' ''Enough! We will not stop.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't want to kill you, Alexios. But I ''will'' stop you.''
*'''Deimos:''' ''My name is Deimos!''
They fought to a stalemate, clashing their weapons together.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If we continue, one of us will die.''
*'''Deimos:''' ''Isn't that the point?''
They jumped back from each other.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I found ''[[Myrrine|mater]].
*'''Deimos:''' ''Finally reunited, only to lose each other again.''
As Deimos rushed in to pounce on Kassandra, a large burning tree fell onto him.

<tabber>
|-|You made your choice.=
Kassandra stepped forward. While she looked at Deimos' body, another burning tree fell, landing on top of her.
|-|Hold on!=
Kassandra stepped forward, preparing to help free Deimos. However, another burning tree fell, landing on top of her.
</tabber>

Section_Outcome: Kassandra participated in the Battle of Pylos, where she met and fought against Deimos. She and Deimos were later trapped by falling burning trees.
Section_Trivia: *The dialogue in the beginning can be skipped. The players can simply enter the battlefield and the memory will proceed accordingly.
